No Sessions so far

timeline

1. Get the Project token

Click on the button in the upper right corner and copy the Project token.


2. Add Mambas Callback to your Keras training

You can pass a list of callbacks (as the keyword argument callbacks) to the .fit() method of the Sequential or Model classes.

  • mambas.keras.callback import MambasCallback
  • ...
  • token = '<project_token>'
  • callback = MambasCallback(token)
  • model.fit(x_train, y_train, callbacks=[callback])

3. That's it! check

Observe and monitor your Deep Learning training Sessions.

Need help?
